::Astral/Starlight::

Astral picks up the new bot and hands him to Starlight. "Here fly him 
to Zardus, I'll take care of the battle."

Starlight nods, taking the bot and launching off, heading for the 
Iron Fist, which was three miles away and would take a little while 
to get to.

Astral looks around, his scanners searching for enemies. He spots 
Prebon, jogging off toward the bot's location, ready to be shot at.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Prebon followed the two alliance bots to the crash site, he decided 
> that it would be the chance to replenish his troops. when he got 
> close enough he saw the big picture. In order to carry the new bot 
> into the Iron fist they'd have to drop the shields and open the 
door. 
> He sat back and waited for the golden moment
